title: Cafeteria Prema
description: A small vegetarian place to get cooked snacks and juices with plenty of vegan options. Offers tamales, sandwiches, and on Friday and Saturday, starting at 3:30pm, has super arepas. Also has a refrigerator case with juices, cakes, natural healthy foods and more. Prices are very low. Only two tables, but the owner can bring out more if necessary. As of January 2014, this is the only vegetarian/vegan option in Monteria.
